content_preview: I moved to Mart/forstair earlier this year. My forstair inhaler dose was halved, and the number of doses I can take doubled. This worked for the end of the pollen season, I was averaging 6 doses a day

I moved to Mart/forstair earlier this year. My forstair inhaler dose was halved, and the number of doses I can take doubled. This worked for the end of the pollen season, I was averaging 6 doses a day

Look at my new peak flow meter! It's got a sticker on the back to record my red orange and green zones and it's also got stickers to mark where they are on the scale! I was going to do it with a pen b
